job.title: Software Engineer(gameplay programming)
job.description:
This Jobot Job is hosted by Angel Macias
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $80,000 - $110,000 per year
Title Gameplay Software Engineer
Location Chicago Illinois (Possible Remote)
Based in the suburbs of Chicago we are a cutting edge gaming and technology company growing at a tremendous pace. We are currently looking for Software Engineers with C/C++ skills to join our team! If you are an Software Engineer in the greater Chicago Illinois market, looking to disrupt the entertainment industry, apply today, or send your resume directly to angel.macias@jobot.com
Do you want to be part of the gaming and entertainment industry with a highly reputable company?
Looking for strong Software Engineers with backgrounds in gameplay programming
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
